overview:
Terence Kawaja is Founder & CEO of LUMA Partners, an strategic advisory firm specializing in the media and technology sectors.

Terence applies his many years of experience making deals in the traditional media and communications sectors to the digital space. He leverages his in-depth knowledge of networks, business models and competitive dynamics to advise both large strategic firms as well as growth companies.

Terence is a compelling orator who has the ability to cut through complicated issues and present clear and compelling opinions on trends and strategies. A popular keynote speaker at top industry conferences, Terence punctuates his substantive messages with the use of comedy and has produced a series of videos on subjects ranging from media & technology to Wall Street (http://www.youtube.com/user/LMcDuff08).
